content: across instep sts pick up 1 st in the corner between the heel flap and instep pick up sts along opposite heel flap k copyright 2018 becky greene page �2 of �4 across sole sts and first side of heel flap ready to knit the instep pm for new start of round round 2 knit across instep k1 ssk k across sole sts to last 3 sts of sole k2tog k1 round 3 knit repeat rnds 2 and 3 until there are 56 64 72 80 sts remaining continue to knit foot in stockinette changing colors as described above work until sock measures 2 less than desired foot length toe round 1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts of sole k2tog k round 2 k repeat these 2 rnds until there are 10 12 16 24 sts left on each of sole and instep kitchener together copyright 2018 becky greene page �3 of �4 charts note sample sock was knit using charts 1-8 in that order knitter s choice dark squares are the contrast yarn light squares are the current scrap color remember that the red line marks where to transition to a new scrap of yarn if desired for chart 8 simply transition to the next leftover after working the final round of contrast color chart 1 chart 2 chart 3 chart 4 chart 5 cha rt 6 chart 7 chart 8 chart 9 chart 10 copyright 2018 becky greene page �4 of �4
